rules: Rule1: If the worker uses a hammer, then the project is on schedule.
Rule2: Under the condition that permit is submitted, permit is received.
Rule3: Either permit is submitted or variance is requested.
Rule4: Whenever variance is requested, if the project is not on schedule, then concrete pour is delayed.
Rule5: If inspection is scheduled, then either inspector is available or, assuming permit is received, plans are approved.
Rule6: If foreman is assigned to the project, then foreman is coordinating.
Rule7: Either foreman is assigned to the project or, under the condition that worker does not use a hammer, worker does not use a drill.
Rule8: If foreman is present on site, then foreman is assigned to the crew.
Rule9: Provided that foreman is supervising, foreman is present on site.
Rule10: Assuming foreman is coordinating, foreman is supervising.
Rule11: In case cement is defective, it is not the case that shipment is rejected.
Rule12: Provided that shipment is returned, shipment is rejected.
Rule13: If the worker uses a saw, then the worker does not use a drill.
Rule14: Assuming the worker operates a crane, the worker operates a forklift.
Rule15: If site preparation is completed, then, under the condition that the worker operates a forklift, the project is on schedule.
Rule16: Provided that foundation work is ongoing, site preparation is completed.
Rule17: Either foundation work is ongoing or framing work is ongoing.
Rule18: Assuming framing work is ongoing, site preparation is completed.
Rule19: If it is not the case that defective cement implies returned shipment, then shipment is accepted.
Rule20: Provided that it is not the case that defective cement implies returned shipment, shipment is not accepted.
Rule21: Under the condition that it is not the case that not using a hammer implies using a saw, the worker uses a level.
Rule22: Whenever it is not the case that not using a hammer implies using a saw, it is not the case that the worker uses a level.
Rule23: If the worker does not use a hammer, then the worker uses a drill.
Rule24: In case site preparation is not completed, cement is defective.
facts: Fact2: The worker operates a crane.
Fact3: It is not the case that concrete pour is delayed.
Fact4: It is not the case that plans are approved.
Fact6: Foreman is not assigned to the crew.
